metadata.name: Instant Item Rooms
metadata.description:
[h1]Better Starting Rooms[/h1] [h2]By mitko8009[/h2] [hr][/hr] The mod teleports you to the item room at the start of every level. [b]It's compatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2681875787]ModConfigMenu [MCM][/url][/b]
[quote=mitko8009]If someone wants to contribute to the project, please DM me on Discord or Instagram.[/quote]
[hr][/hr] [b]By: mitko8009[/b] Instagram: [url=https://www.instagram.com/mitko8009_/]@mitko8009_[/url] Discord: [b]mitko8009[/b] If you find bugs, please create a new discussion on the mod page.
